content: Mobile Application For Sale. Bitcoin Faucet software program.  The application is live. Google and Admob licensed. Payment invoices will be sent.WhatsApp: 905427491140Google Play Storehttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hollytechx.bitcoin_capital_earn

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.created_time: March 24, 2023, 06:38:16 PMLast edit: March 24, 2023, 06:56:48 PM by OmegaStarScream
comments.body: The math doesn't add up. How can you generate 50$ per day when you only have +10 downloads?

comments.author: Ataman81
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 24, 2023, 06:38:16 PMThe math doesn't add up. How can you generate 50$ per day when you only have +10 downloads? Yes .You can earn more when we increase the user.  For now, he earns 10-15 USD per day.  I work with 13 advertising companies.

comments.author: Rohan Kotkar
comments.body: Quote from: Ataman81 on March 24, 2023, 07:19:17 PMQuote from: OmegaStarScream on March 24, 2023, 06:38:16 PMThe math doesn't add up. How can you generate 50$ per day when you only have +10 downloads? Yes .You can earn more when we increase the user.  For now, he earns 10-15 USD per day.  I work with 13 advertising companies.Why do those advertising companies pay you for 10+ downloads?My second question :From where & how does the users using the faucet receice bitcoin as I can not see any fund backing?Who earns 10-15 USD per day? You or the user using faucet? According to me, both can't earn that amount per day considering the current conditions.

comments.author: karmamiu
comments.body: Is this another clickbait or something? Forgive me but this doesn't make sense to me. Even the most reputable faucets like freebitco.in doesn't give you $10 a day, not unless you get lucky of course to get the prizes or play their spins and of course you still need to wager.

comments.author: Zwei
comments.body: Wrong section dude, you should move this to the marketplace. and for the love of bitcoin include your asking price for this "Mobile Application", not that anyone is going to be intrested in buying it, but you do you.
